channel.title: Sbt on Machine Learning
channel.description: Recent content in Sbt on Machine Learning

item.title: Scala the Language
item.description: Install Sbt # echo "deb https://dl.bintray.com/sbt/debian /" | sudo tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list.d/sbt.list sudo apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv 2EE0EA64E40A89B84B2DF73499E82A75642AC823 sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install sbt ref: scala-sbt.org (v1.0) Compile # see ref
